Vulois

Vulois watched the bot leave.

"Never come back! I will not have AngelNemesis ruining my dream!"

He turned to the three bots.

"As I said, I am Vulois. This is Embassy Mountain, where a peaceful 
group of bots negotiate with the others for peace, so that we may 
save Cybertron from the vicious nebula that will strike soon. Come, I 
will evaluate you. You must stick very close to me. Their are many 
tunnels in this mountain, and only one takes the right way. If you 
get off track you will wander this mountain forever. Now come."

Vulois went back inside, waiting for the bots to follow.
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Trainers

Blaze continued to work on Striker. She had chosen a cold-blooded 
killer who had total loyalty to Prebon for his new persona. That's 
what The Trainers needed if they were to make a huge impact on this 
planet. She had basically put in the new persona, and now she was 
replacing his vital systems, because they had been mostly destroyed 
when he tried to shoot the chip. Soon they would have the greatest 
warrior on this planet, and they would defeat everyone. Blaze laughed 
to herself, and continued working.

Igntius stepped out of his CR Chamber, repaired from Striker's 
attack. He went down to the cargo area to meet Hammer and Bullet.

"So how's the BH2 coming along?"

"Great! We're almost done, and when we are it will cause so much 
destruction we will be unstoppable."

"Good, good. Prebon was saying that he wants Striker to where it when 
he's done. We all have Tamron, so it would be good for Striler to 
have back up firepower. He's going to be the greatest mercinairy 
we've ever had."

"Alright, fine. But give us a hand, would ya?"

Ignatius, Hammer and Bullet got to work on the BH2.
